text_block_list.text: ――There was a dream that I wanted to nurture.

One that sets fire to the hearts of everyone who sees it…… 
One that would be seen as a prelude to a new era――
――A dream to raise a strong Uma Musume.

Yes, it's there. 
In my heart, there is that big dream.
……But then, why――

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer
text_block_list.text:
――And that's why, first I'll raise an Uma Musume 
that can win. I'll work my hardest to make sure 
she doesn't finish with out a single win.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Then, someday……I want to be able to bring forth 
wonderful Uma Musume that can win Major races.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Yes, thank you. A clear statement of your determination. 
……and whoever is next, please present.
……On this day, we were in a seminar for new trainers.

This was an opportunity to show my determination 
as a new trainer, everyone here seemed upstanding, 
and spoke of down-to-earth goals――

――But what came out of my mouth were words that 
mirrored those of the other trainers and their goals.

……I understood it already. 
My dreams were something too grand for a rookie.

As a rookie without experience or even a trainee, for 
that dream, I had no choice but to work hard everyday.

In order to find an Uma Musume I might train in the future, 
I decided to go observe the training grounds today――

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
――And that's why, even though it's sudden, I'm searching 
for someone to do some parallel running training with me. 
If you don't mind, would anyone lend me their strength?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's an opportunity. So that it's a fruitful 
learning experience for everyone, I will work 
my hardest. So feel free to raise your hand.

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, raise your hand……! 
You said you're a big fan of President Rudolf, didn't you……!?

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
No way, no way, no way, no way! I just debuted! 
There's no way I could run! My legs are already shaking……!

……For some reason, it seemed like Symboli Rudolf, the first 7-crown 
Uma Musume in history, was looking for a parallel running partner.

But, right now, all the Uma Musume on the course had only just 
started their careers. It was no surprise that they were a 
little nervous. Their opponent was basically a living legend.

――――Lucky. 
Starting off with a bang……!
――Hup!

As if to pop the heavy atmosphere, that Uma Musume 
hopped on to the course with a spring in her step――
――Rudolf-senpai!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Bubble Gum Fellow……――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
You're looking for a partner for parallel running, right? 
Then, would you mind running with me?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: I won't leave you bored. For sure.

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
Huh, that's Bubble Gum Fellow-senpai, right……? 
If I remember correctly, senpai hasn't debuted yet――

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl D
text_block_list.text:
Right!? And she still wants to parallel run with the Student 
Council President? Her mental strength must be crazy～……!

The surrounding crowd was buzzing, and I was also 
curious about this Uma Musume――Bubble Gum Fellow's 
abilities. I headed to the front row of seats.

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: Ah, they're going to run now……!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Fuu……!!

Smooth acceleration and an effortless start. Her form was 
refined but powerful enough to take your breath away.

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl D
text_block_list.text:
Uwaah, her acceleration is intense……! 
Even against President Rudolf, she's already created a huge lead……!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Ohhh…… 
――――So that's what you're going with.

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
――She's maintaining that separation, huh? It's already the second 
half of the race but, I wonder if she's going to keep this pace.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ……now!!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ――Haaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Even though she was already leading with this pace, 
she can still spurt like this……!? Then, maybe……!

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Aaah, but――!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ――Fuu!!

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl D
text_block_list.text:
Uwah, she's going to chase from there!? As expected of President 
Rudolf……! If it's like this, there's no way, right!?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Not yet, not yet――!!

The gap started to widen, but all the way until 
the very end, she never gave up on victory――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Haaa, haaa, haaa……! 
Kuu……it wasn't enough, huh……!?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
――Bubble Gum Fellow. Thank you for the parallel running. 
It was a very spirited run, I also found it very enriching.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Likewise…… Thank you, very much……! 
……Huuuuu…………but――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
I won't lose next time. I'll definitely show 
you an amazing run. For sure. So――sometime soon, 
will you do some more parallel running with me?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ……truly, this must be what they call fearlessness.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Very well. As my appreciation for today. 
And as an acknowledgement of your resoluteness.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Alright……! 
Thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
……Whoa～, she's amazing enough to be able to run 
with the Prez, and now she's even aiming for a 
rematch……there's such a difference between us……

She fearlessly challenges incredibly strong opponents, 
displays her talents to the fullest, and her fighting 
spirit burns brightly even after losing――

The way she looked so refreshed, even glistening 
with sweat, seemed really……dazzling to me.
